channel.title: Clear Creek County|Colorado|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Clear Creek County|Colorado|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 232
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 232 - US-40 West/Empire/Granby. US-40 east joins I-70/US-6 eastbound.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 232
item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 232 - US-40 West/Empire/Granby. US-40 east joins I-70 east to Golden.

item.title: I-70 East - Express Toll Lanes
item.description: I-70 East approaching entrance Express Toll Lanes. This lane is the left most lane and runs to US-6 junction above Golden.

item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 226 - Silver Plume.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 216
item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 216 - US-6 West/Loveland Pass. US-6 East joins I-70 East through Idaho Springs.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 216
item.description: I-70 west at Exit 216 - US-6 West/Loveland Pass. US-6 leaves I-70 westbound here, and crosses Loveland Pass, while I-70 enters the Eisenhower Tunnel. This is the last exit before the Eisenhower Tunnel.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 232
item.description: I-70 west at Exit 232 - US-40 West/Empire/Granby. US-40 leaves I-70 westbound, and begins climb to Berthoud Pass.

item.title: I-70 West - Routes to Salt Lake City
item.description: I-70 west approaching Exit 232 - US-40 West. Alternate routes to Salt Lake City via either US-40 West (and I-80) or I-70 West (and US-191/US-89/I-15).

item.title: Central City Parkway approaching I-70
item.description: Central City Parkway approaching I-70. Use I-70 west for Idaho Springs; I-70 east for Denver.

item.title: US-6 East at CO-119
item.description: US-6 East at CO-119. Turn left for CO-119 West to Black Hawk and Central City.

item.title: US-40 East - Berthoud Pass Skiers Warning
item.description: US-40 at Berthoud Pass. Backcountry skiers warning.

item.title: US-40 - Berthoud Pass
item.description: US-40 at Berthoud Pass. Continental Divide and Grand-Clear Creek County Line.

item.title: US-40 - Berthoud Pass Backcountry Ski Information
item.description: US-40 at Berthoud Pass. Backcountry ski warning. Avalanche blasting at any time using long range weaponry.
